results.title: Development and progression of atherosclerosis in aorta from heterozygous and homozygous WHHL rabbits. Effects of simvastatin treatment.
results.text_hl: This study was conducted to define progression of @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ in both homozygous and heterozygous @<m>DISEASE_Familial_Primary_Pulmonary_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065627 @@@Watanabe heritable hyperlipidemic@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Familial_Primary_Pulmonary_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065627 @@@WHHL@@@) @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ and to investigate the ability of the @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_100357791 @@@HMG CoA reductase@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to attenuate progression of the disease.

citations.NLM: Dowell FJ, Hamilton CA, Lindop GB, Reid JL. Development and progression of atherosclerosis in aorta from heterozygous and homozygous WHHL rabbits. Effects of simvastatin treatment. Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol. 1995 Aug;15(8):1152-60. PMID: 7627709
citations.BibTeX: @article{7627709, title={Development and progression of atherosclerosis in aorta from heterozygous and homozygous WHHL rabbits. Effects of simvastatin treatment.}, author={Dowell FJ and Hamilton CA and Lindop GB and Reid JL}, journal={Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol}, volume={15}, number={8}, pages={1152-60}}

results.title: Inhibitory effects of simvastatin on platelet-derived growth factor signaling in pulmonary artery smooth muscle cells from patients with idiopathic pulmonary arterial hypertension.
results.text_hl: Inhibitory effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on platelet-derived growth factor signaling in pulmonary artery smooth muscle cells from @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Familial_Primary_Pulmonary_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065627 @@@idiopathic pulmonary arterial hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Ikeda T, Nakamura K, Akagi S, Kusano KF, Matsubara H, Fujio H, Ogawa A, Miura A, Miura D, Oto T, Yamanaka R, Otsuka F, Date H, Ohe T, Ito H. Inhibitory effects of simvastatin on platelet-derived growth factor signaling in pulmonary artery smooth muscle cells from patients with idiopathic pulmonary arterial hypertension. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2010 Jan;55(1):39-48. PMID: 19786891
